mapper.select: SELECT d.USR_SEQ, d.USR_NM, d.RA_CD, d.GR_CD, d.SKILLS, c.USR_PRJ_IN_DT, c.USR_PRJ_OT_DT, c.RL_CD FROM USER_PROJECT_TABLE c LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT a.*, b.SKILLS FROM USER_INFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT USR_SEQ, LISTAGG(SK_CD, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY SK_CD) AS SKILLS FROM USER_SKILL_TABLE GROUP BY USR_SEQ ) b ON a.USR_SEQ = b.USR_SEQ ) d ON c.USR_SEQ = d.USR_SEQ WHERE PRJ_SEQ = #{userProjectDTO.prjSeq}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT d.USR_SEQ, d.USR_NM, d.RA_CD, d.GR_CD, d.SKILLS, c.USR_PRJ_IN_DT, c.USR_PRJ_OT_DT, c.RL_CD FROM USER_PROJECT_TABLE c LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT a.*, b.SKILLS FROM USER_INFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT USR_SEQ, LISTAGG(SK_CD, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY SK_CD) AS SKILLS FROM USER_SKILL_TABLE GROUP BY USR_SEQ ) b ON a.USR_SEQ = b.USR_SEQ ) d ON c.USR_SEQ = d.USR_SEQ WHERE PRJ_SEQ = #{userProjectDTO.prjSeq} )
